title.narrative: Cluster Munition and Other Conventional Weapons Clearance in Central Vietnam

description.narrative: This project is a continuation of activities conducted under Option Year 2. The goal of this project is to increase civilian security by protecting lives and property through the clearance of cluster munitions and other ERW, returning land and infrastructure to safe and productive use as well as providing operational management capacity-building support to a long-term Vietnamese operator. MAG will continue to deploy its existing operational capacity of 17 Mine Action Teams (MATs), two Multi-Task Teams (MTTs), and six Clearance Support Teams (CSTs). The deployment of these teams will lead to the release of over 15.9 million m2 of land, with an estimated agricultural yield of $34,846,609 over ten years.

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity

sector.narrative: Conflict Prevention and Resolution/Peace and Security
